//Run this command in your virtual environment or terminal:

(pip install flask flask_sqlalchemy bcrypt werkzeug Flask-Mail google-auth requests)

//Explanation of Required Packages:

 1.Flask – Web framework for building web applications.

 2.Flask-SQLAlchemy – Adds support for databases using SQLAlchemy in Flask.

 3.Werkzeug – Provides utilities for secure file uploads (secure_filename).

 4.bcrypt – Used for hashing passwords.

 5.datetime (built-in) – No installation required.

 6.os (built-in) – No installation required.


//Run this command in the terminal for creating a virtual environment :

(python -m venv venv)



//Run this command in the terminal for activating the virtual environment :

(venv\Scripts\activate)



//Run this command in the terminal for Running the Python Code :

(python app.py)
